TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ActivityAction`3<T1, T2, T3> extends System.Activities.ActivityDelegate
Public NotInheritable Class ActivityAction(Of T1, T2, T3) Inherits ActivityDelegate
generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3> public ref class ActivityAction sealed : System::Activities::ActivityDelegate

Docs.typeparam: The type of the first in argument of the activity delegate.
The type of the second in argument of the activity delegate.
The type of the third in argument of the activity delegate.
Docs.summary: Defines an activity delegate that has three in arguments and does not return a value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An activity delegate allows a developer to define the required signature of an activity that will be specified by a third party.
There are multiple generic versions of this type that take from 1 to 16 arguments for the activity that is called. There are also **ActivityFunc** types for activity delegates that return values.
